sections.name: page_1
pages: ["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"The Ender Bolt Shamir is found on Thorium Bands. It can be placed onto swords and tridents.\n\nA mob hit will Ender Bolt will wither away, passing the effect to other nearby mobs."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.ender_bolt_shamir.2"}]}]
